MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.46pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:48 PM on Sunday, 21 March 2021
